languages.text: {n}Сухие пальцы префекта впиваются в руны инфопластины.{/n} "Да, как я и думала... К превеликому сожалению, сейчас это не представляется возможным. Силы Сонма уже ломают двери хора. Дальнейшая отсрочка приведет к неконтролируемым последствиям".

traits.locale_text: {n}Сухие пальцы Префекта впиваются в руны инфопланшета.{/n} "Да, как я и думала... К превеликому сожалению, сейчас это не представляется возможным. Силы Сонма уже ломают двери хора. Дальнейшая отсрочка приведет к неконтролируемым последствиям".
traits.speaker: VC_Prefect

languages.text: {n}The prefect's dry fingers press down on the runes on her data-slate.{/n} "As I thought... I deeply regret to inform you that said further investigation is impossible. The Host's fighters are already breaking down the doors of the Choir. Delaying the decision would lead to uncontrollable consequences."
languages.original_text: {n}Сухие пальцы префекта впиваются в руны инфопластины.{/n} "Да, как я и думала... К превеликому сожалению, сейчас это не представляется возможным. Силы Сонма уже ломают двери хора. Дальнейшая отсрочка приведет к неконтролируемым последствиям".

traits.locale_text: {n}The prefect's dry fingers press down on the runes on her data-slate.{/n} "As I thought... I deeply regret to inform you that said further investigation is impossible. The Host's fighters are already breaking down the doors of the Choir. Delaying the decision would lead to uncontrollable consequences."

{n}The Prefect clicks her tongue so loudly that people in the audience turn to look. Having made sure she has everyone's attention, she leans toward you.{/n} "That is impossible. The Host's fighters are already breaking down the doors of the Choir. Either you make a decision now or you will have a massacre on your hands."

{n}The Prefect clicks her tongue so loudly that people in the audience turn to look. Having confirmed that she has everyone's attention, she leans toward you.{/n} "That is impossible. The Host's fighters are already breaking down the doors of the Choir. Either you make a decision now, or you will have a massacre on your hands."

The Host's fighters are already breaking down the doors of the Choir. Either you make a decision now, or you will have a massacre on your hands."

{n}The prefect's dry fingers press down on the runes on her data-slate.{/n} "As I thought... I deeply regret to inform you that said further investigation is impossible. The Host's fighters are already breaking down the doors of the Choir. Delaying the decision would lead to uncontrollable consequences."

languages.text: {n}Die Präfektin drückt mit ihren trockenen Fingern auf die Runen ihres Datablocks.{/n} "Genau wie ich dachte ... Ich bedauere, Euch mitteilen zu müssen, dass weitere Untersuchungen unmöglich sind. Die Kämpfer des Gastgebers reißen bereits die Türen des Chors ein. Eine Vertagung der Entscheidung hätte unkontrollierbare Konsequenzen."
languages.original_text: {n}The prefect's dry fingers press down on the runes on her data-slate.{/n} "As I thought... I deeply regret to inform you that said further investigation is impossible. The Host's fighters are already breaking down the doors of the Choir. Delaying the decision would lead to uncontrollable consequences."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Präfektin drückt mit ihren trockenen Fingern auf die Runen ihres Datablocks.{/n} "Genau wie ich dachte ... Ich bedauere, Euch mitteilen zu müssen, dass weitere Untersuchungen unmöglich sind. Die Kämpfer des Gastgebers reißen bereits die Türen des Chors ein. Eine Vertagung der Entscheidung hätte unkontrollierbare Konsequenzen."

languages.text: {n}Les doigts décharnés de la préfète courent sur les runes de sa plaque de données.{/n} « C'est bien ce que je pensais... J'ai le regret de vous informer qu'il est impossible de poursuivre l'enquête. Les combattants du Concile sont déjà en train d'enfoncer les portes du chœur. Différer la décision entraînerait des conséquences dont nul ne pourrait mesurer les conséquences. »
languages.original_text: {n}The prefect's dry fingers press down on the runes on her data-slate.{/n} "As I thought... I deeply regret to inform you that said further investigation is impossible. The Host's fighters are already breaking down the doors of the Choir. Delaying the decision would lead to uncontrollable consequences."

traits.locale_text: {n}Les doigts décharnés de la préfète courent sur les runes de sa plaque de données.{/n} « C'est bien ce que je pensais... J'ai le regret de vous informer qu'il est impossible de poursuivre l'enquête. Les combattants du Concile sont déjà en train d'enfoncer les portes du chœur. Différer la décision entraînerait des conséquences dont nul ne pourrait mesurer les conséquences. »

languages.text: {n}行政官干瘪的手指敲击着数据板上的符文。{/n}“和我想的一样……我非常遗憾地告知您，目前恐怕无法进行进一步调查，阴沉之主的战士们已经攻破了星域唱诗班居所的大门。若是继续拖延下去，恐怕会导致无法控制的后果。”
languages.original_text: {n}The prefect's dry fingers press down on the runes on her data-slate.{/n} "As I thought... I deeply regret to inform you that said further investigation is impossible. The Host's fighters are already breaking down the doors of the Choir. Delaying the decision would lead to uncontrollable consequences."

traits.locale_text: {n}行政官干瘪的手指敲击着数据板上的符文。{/n}“和我想的一样……我非常遗憾地告知您，目前恐怕无法进行进一步调查，阴沉之主的战士们已经攻破了星域唱诗班居所的大门。若是继续拖延下去，恐怕会导致无法控制的后果。”

languages.text: {n}Los dedos secos de la prefecta aprietan las runas de su tablilla de datos.{/n} «Como pensaba... Lamento profundamente informarle de que dicha investigación es imposible. Los guerreros de la Hueste ya están derribando las puertas del Coro. Retrasar la decisión tendrá consecuencias incontrolables».
languages.original_text: {n}The prefect's dry fingers press down on the runes on her data-slate.{/n} "As I thought... I deeply regret to inform you that said further investigation is impossible. The Host's fighters are already breaking down the doors of the Choir. Delaying the decision would lead to uncontrollable consequences."

traits.locale_text: {n}Los dedos secos de la prefecta aprietan las runas de su tablilla de datos.{/n} «Como pensaba... Lamento profundamente informarle de que dicha investigación es imposible. Los guerreros de la Hueste ya están derribando las puertas del Coro. Retrasar la decisión tendrá consecuencias incontrolables».

languages.text: {n}総監の乾いた指がデータスレートのルーンを押した。{/n}「思った通りです…誠に申し訳ありませんが、さらなる調査が不可能であることをお伝えしなければなりません。ホストの戦士たちはすでに聖歌隊の扉を破ってしまいました。決定を遅らせれば、制御不能な事態を招くことでしょう」
languages.original_text: {n}The prefect's dry fingers press down on the runes on her data-slate.{/n} "As I thought... I deeply regret to inform you that said further investigation is impossible. The Host's fighters are already breaking down the doors of the Choir. Delaying the decision would lead to uncontrollable consequences."

languages.text: {n}Prefekt, kuru parmaklarını databeladaki rünlere bastırıyor.{/n} "Düşündüğümüz gibi... Söz konusu soruşturmayı devam ettirmenin mümkün olmadığını üzülerek belirtiyorum. Konakçı'nın savaşçıları, hâlihazırda Koro'nun kapılarını kırıyor. Kararı geciktirmek, kontrol edilemez sonuçlara yol açacaktır."
languages.original_text: {n}The prefect's dry fingers press down on the runes on her data-slate.{/n} "As I thought... I deeply regret to inform you that said further investigation is impossible. The Host's fighters are already breaking down the doors of the Choir. Delaying the decision would lead to uncontrollable consequences."

Konakçı'nın savaşçıları, hâlihazırda Koro'nun kapılarını kırıyor. Kararı geciktirmek, kontrol edilemez sonuçlara yol açacaktır."
